name: Dot Dot Connect
description:
Dot Dot Connect is a top tricky puzzle game for you. Only with brain and logical skills will you be possible to win each level and master this points game!

Connect two color points, pair all points and cover the entire board.
Features:
- Over 1,000 free puzzles
- 2 modes: free play and time trial modes
- clean,beautiful visuals
- 3 difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard
- very simple to play, but requires complex thinking skills
